profitbricks-datasource-datacenter.body:
data "profitbricks_datacenter" "$1" {
    # name - (Required) Name or part of the name of an existing Virtual Data Center that you want to search for.
    name = ""

    # location - (Optional) Id of the existing Virtual Data Center's location.
    location = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - UUID of the Virtual Data Center
}
profitbricks-datasource-datacenter.description: The data centers data source can be used to search for and return an existing Virtual Data Center. You can provide a string for the name and location parameters which will be compared with provisioned Virtual Data Centers. If a single match is found, it will be returned. If your search results in multiple matches, an error will be generated. When this happens, please refine your search string so that it is specific enough to return only one result.

profitbricks-datasource-image.body:
data "profitbrick_image" "$1" {
    # name - (Required) Name or part of the name of an existing image that you want to search for.
    name = ""

    # version - (Optional) Version of the image (see details below).
    version = ""

    # location - (Optional) Id of the existing image's location.
    location = ""

    # type - (Optional) The image type, HDD or CD-ROM.
    type = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - UUID of the image
}
profitbricks-datasource-image.description: The images data source can be used to search for and return an existing image which can then be used to provision a server.

profitbricks-datasource-location.body:
data "profitbrick_location" "$1" {
    # name - (Required) Name or part of the location name to search for.
    name = ""

    # feature - (Optional) A desired feature that the location must be able to provide.
    feature = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - UUID of the location
}
profitbricks-datasource-location.description: The locations data source can be used to search for and return an existing location which can then be used elsewhere in the configuration.

profitbricks-datasource-resource.body:
data "profitbricks_resource" "$1" {
    # resource_type - (Optional) The specific type of resources to retrieve information about.
    resource_type = ""

    # resource_id - (Optional) The ID of the specific resource to retrieve information about.
    resource_id = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - UUID of the Resource
}
profitbricks-datasource-resource.description: The resource data source can be used to search for and return any existing ProfitBricks resource and optionally their group associations. You can provide a string for the resource type (datacenter,image,snapshot,ipblock) and/or resource id parameters which will be queries against available resources. If a single match is found, it will be returned. If your search results in multiple matches, an error will be generated. When this happens, please refine your search string so that it is specific enough to return only one result.

profitbricks-datasource-snapshot.body:
data "profitbrick_snapshot" "$1" {
    # name - (Required) Name or part of the name of an existing snapshot that you want to search for.
    name = ""

    # location - (Optional) Id of the existing snapshot's location.
    location = ""

    # size - (Optional) The size of the snapshot to look for.
    size = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - UUID of the snapshot
}
profitbricks-datasource-snapshot.description: The snapshots data source can be used to search for and return an existing snapshot which can then be used to provision a server.

profitbricks-resource-datacenter.body:
resource "profitbricks_datacenter" "$1" {
    # location - (Required) 
    location = ""

    # name - (Required) 
    name = ""

    # description - (Optional) 
    description = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
profitbricks-resource-datacenter.description: Manages a Virtual Data Center on ProfitBricks

profitbricks-resource-firewall.description: Manages a Firewall Rules on ProfitBricks

profitbricks-resource-group.description: Manages groups and group priviliages on ProfitBricks

profitbricks-resource-ipblock.description: Manages a IP Blocks on ProfitBricks

profitbricks-resource-ipfailover.description: Manages Ip Failover groups on ProfitBricks

profitbricks-resource-loadbalancer.description: Manages a Load Balancers on ProfitBricks

profitbricks-resource-share.description: Manages shares and list shares permissions granted to the group members for each shared resource.

profitbricks-resource-user.description: Manages users and list users and groups associated.
